title: Turtle Beach Recon Chat Xbox Headset for Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm – Glasses Friendly, High-Sensitivity Mic - Black
features: WORKS WITH XBOX SERIES X|S – This designed for Xbox One headset has ongoing compatibility with Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S

VERSATILE COMPATIBILITY - The Turtle Beach Recon Chat headset works great with PS5, PS4, and PS4 Pro, and works great with Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC & Mobile devices with 3.5mm Connection
CRYSTAL CLEAR CHAT - An adjustable, high-sensitivity mic picks-up your voice and ensures your every command is heard loud and clear

UNIQUE OPEN EAR-CUP - The Recon Chat headset features an open ear-cup design which allows gamers to hear game audio from the TV or home theater system in both ears, while hearing chat audio from other players through the headset

GLASSES FRIENDLY - Turtle Beach’s innovative SpecsFit glasses avoidance zone lets gamers with glasses play in comfort, thanks to the special channel in the ear-cushion which alleviates any added pressure on your glasses from the headset
REVERSIBLE OVER-EAR DESIGN - The Recon Chat features a full-size over-ear ear-cup that can be worn on the right or left ear, whichever is more comfortable
HIGH QUALITY 40MM SPEAKER - A large, high quality 40mm speaker delivers crystal clear chat audio
CONVENIENT IN-LINE CONTROLS - The Turtle Beach Recon Chat convenient in-line controls place Chat Volume and Mic Mute right at your fingertips
description: Time to replace the chat headset that came with your console? Then it’s time to get more for your money with the Turtle Beach Recon Chat headset for Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S and Xbox One. The Recon Chat is lightweight and reversible, and features Turtle Beach’s SpecsFit glasses friendly over-ear design with a unique open earcup that lets you hear game audio from the TV or home entertainment system. Additionally, a high-sensitivity mic ensures your every command is heard loud and clear while the high-quality 40mm speaker delivers chat audio from other players. The Recon Chat easily connects to Xbox controllers with a 3.5mm jack, and in-line controls conveniently place Mic Mute and Chat Volume at your fingertips.
